name: Please Hold!
description:
Please Hold! A Representative Will Be With You Shortly! allows you to replay a classic tale of love, loss, and - most importantly - the trials and tribulations of troubleshooting your internet connection.

This is a choice-based game. It takes between 5-45 minutes to complete, depending on how you play. There are random disconnect events that may extend your play time. (That is a feature, not a bug). Please Hold! was originally created for Ludum Dare 30 for the theme of "Connected World".
